c74object.name: br.utility.stereo.1.0~
c74object.description: This is a basic external for Max/MSP that allows the user to adjust mix of a stereo signal, such as swapping, left only, right only, mid, or side. Additionally, the user can adjust the width or the pan of the resulting signal.Currently works in any sample rate or bit depth.
c74object.digest: This is a basic external for Max/MSP that allows the user to adjust mix of a stereo signal, such as swapping, left only, right only, mid, or side. Additionally, the user can adjust the width or the pan of the resulting signal.Currently works in any sample rate or bit depth.
